Post.title: Hexo+Next+GitHub
Post._content:
Hexo+Next+GitHub
===

### 

Hexonode.jsMarkdown

1. 

	HexoNext [blog-generater](https://github.com/juncaixinchi/blog-generater)

2. 

	publicGithub Pages [Blogs](https://juncaixinchi.github.io/Blogs/)

<!-- more -->

### Hexo

node.jsnpmhexo

	npm install -g hexo-cli



	cd ~/Github/



	hexo init blog
	cd blog


 http://127.0.0.1:4000/ 

	hexo server

"Hello Hexo"Hello-Hexo.md

	vi ./source/_posts/Hello-Hexo.md

Github Pages

	hexo generate

	hexo deploy



	hexo generate --deploy


### generate and deploy

 hexo-deployer-git.

	$ npm install hexo-deployer-openshift --save

githubrepositoryBlogs

	deploy:
	  type: git
	  repo: git@github.com:juncaixinchi/Blogs.git
	  branch: master
	  


	hexo generate --deploy


### 

 Hexo  _config.yml  Hexo 

   

#### GitHubcssjs

	url: https://juncaixinchi.github.io/Blogs/
	root: /Blogs/

####  

   language 

	language: zh-Hans

####  

avatar.png source/images/  avatar
	
	avatar: /images/avatar.png

#### 

nextGitHub Pages

	Page build failed: Missing submodule

submodule themes/next/ 

	$ git submodule add git@github.com:juncaixinchi/hexo-theme-next.git themes/next

	$ git submodule init

	$ git submodule update


#### Scheme

Scheme  NexT  SchemeNexT   Scheme  NexT  Scheme

Muse -  Scheme NexT 
Mist - Muse 
Pisces -  Scheme
Scheme   scheme   scheme  scheme  # 

	#scheme: Muse
	#scheme: Mist
	scheme: Pisces

#### 

 tags 

	hexo new page "tags"

 tags   Disqus  comments  false

	title: All tags
	date: 2014-12-22 12:39:04
	type: "tags"
	comments: false
	---

 _config.yml  tags  menu :

	menu:
	  home: /
  	  archives: /archives
  	  tags: /tags

#### 404

404source/404.html
```html
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
	<meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8;"/>
	<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1" />
	<meta name="robots" content="all" />
	<meta name="robots" content="index,follow"/>
</head>
<body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.qq.com/404/search_children.js" charset="utf-8" homePageUrl="https://juncaixinchi.github.io/Blogs/" homePageName="">
	</script>
</body>
</html>
```
httpjsGithubhttps

```html
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
	<meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8;"/>
	<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1" />
	<meta name="robots" content="all" />
	<meta name="robots" content="index,follow"/>
</head>
<body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="404/search_children.js" charset="utf-8" homePageUrl="https://juncaixinchi.github.io/Blogs/" homePageName="">
	</script>
</body>
</html>
```
404

	hexo new page "404"

source/404/search_children.js

```html
var _base = 'https://qzone.qq.com/gy/404/';
document.write('<script type="text/javascript" src="' + _base + 'data.js" charset="utf-8"></script>');
document.write('<script type="text/javascript" src="'+ _base + 'page.js" charset="utf-8"></script>');
```

  1. HexoNext blog-generater

  2. publicGithub Pages Blogs

cd blog

Post.title: Github Git Cheat Sheet
Post._content:
GitHub Git 
===

## 

	git add *



	git commit -m "upload files"



	git push

commitGitHub

<!-- more -->

## 
GitGitHubGit

 https://services.github.com/on-demand/downloads/zh_CN/github-git-cheat-sheet/ 

### Git
GitHubGit

GitHub for Windows
http://windows.github.com

GitHub for Mac
http://mac.github.com

GitHubLinuxPOSIXGit SCM

Git 
http://git-scm.com

### 


	$ git config --global user.name "[name]"

commit

	$ git config --global user.email "[email address]"

commit

### 


	$ git init [project-name]



	$ git clone [url]



### 
commit

	$ git status

commit

	$ git diff



	$ git add [file]



	$ git diff --staged



	$ git reset [file]



	$ git commit -m"[descriptive message]"



### 
commit

	$ git branch



	$ git branch [branch-name]



	$ git checkout [branch-name]



	$ git merge [branch-name]



	$ git branch -d [branch-name]



### 


	$ git rm [file]



	$ git rm --cached [file]



	$ git mv [file-original] [file-renamed]

commit

### 


	*.log build/ temp-*

.gitignore

	$ git ls-files --others --ignored --exclude-standard



### 


	$ git stash



	$ git stash pop

stash

	$ git stash list

stash

	$ git stash drop

stash

### 


	$ git log



	$ git log --follow [file]



	$ git diff [first-branch]...[second-branch]



	$ git show [commit]

commit

### commit


	$ git reset [commit]

[commit]commit

	$ git reset --hard [commit]

commit

### 


	$ git fetch [remote]



	$ git merge [remote]/[branch]



	$ git push [remote] [branch]

commitGitHub

	$ git pull

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

# Node

nodejs(nodejs.org)

WindowsNodeJS+NPM+Bower

WindowsNodeJS+NPM+Bower



WindowsNodeJS+NPM+Bower

nodejscmd  node - v 

WindowsNodeJS+NPM+Bower

npmNodeJSnpmnpmcmd npm -v

WindowsNodeJS+NPM+Bower

# npm

npmNodeJSnpmcacheNodeJSNodeJsnode_globalnode_cachecmd
	npm config set prefix "D:\Program Files\nodejs\node_global"
	
	npm config set cache "D:\Program Files\nodejs\node_cache"

NODE_PATHD:\Program Files\nodejs\node_global\node_modules
bower, npm install bower -g; -g

 noderequire('bower')
